text: Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata wa, arra ga kudasa reta mono o shinji nasai.' To iwa reru to, kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi (yudayahito) wa, watashi-tachi ni kudasa reta mono o shinjiru.' To iu. Sore igai no mono wa, tatoe kare-ra ga shoji suru mono o kakusho suru shinride sae mo shinjinai. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gataga moshi shinjanaraba, naze izen arra no yogen-sha-tachi o satsugai shita no ka
